pkgmetadata.longdescription: Nonparametric Estimation and Inference of a Monotone Hazard Ratio Function // A tool for nonparametric estimation and inference of a non-decreasing monotone hazard ratio from a right censored survival dataset. The estimator is based on a generalized Grenander typed estimator, and the inference procedure relies on direct plugin estimation of a first order derivative. More details please refer to the paper "Nonparametric inference under a monotone hazard ratio order" by Y. Wu and T. Westling (2022) arXiv:2205.01745.
